TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITransportHeaders

Docs.summary: Stores a collection of headers used in the channel sinks.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns a <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator"> that iterates over all entries in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ITransportHeaders> object.
Docs.returns: A <see cref="T:System.Collections.IEnumerator"> that iterates over all entries in the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Channels.ITransportHeaders> object.

MemberSignature.Value: public object this[object key] { get; set; }

Docs.param: The key the requested transport header is associated with.
Docs.summary: Gets or sets a transport header associated with the given key.
Docs.value: A transport header associated with the given key.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If a stored header is set to `null`, the key-value pair is removed.
